cast.name: 玛里亚娜·希梅内斯 Mariana Ximenes

introduction: Genre FictionDirector Bruno SafadiCast Gustavo Falcao, Ivan Cardoso, Mariana XimenesYear 2003Duration 15 minutesColor B & W35mm gaugeCountry BrazilAntonio wants to give his girlfriend, the prostitute Ioio, a star. He meets a salesman who claims he can get one for him, with certificate included! After many negotiations, Antonio finds out he has been taken in.AwardsBest Film - Jury People in CineEsquemaNovo - Film Festival in Porto Alegre 2004"Highlight in Technical Assistance" at the Festival of American Cinema University 2004Best Film on Film Festival Luso-Brazilian from Santa Maria da Feira 2004
